publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-215.1 Shona Robison: National Health Service Reform (Scotland) Bill-As an amendment to motion (S2M-215) in the name of Malcolm Chisholm, insert at end "but, in so doing, believes that there must be safeguards in place to ensure the independence of the proposed new Scottish Health Council and is concerned about the lack of detail in the Financial Memorandum regarding potential additional costs arising from the Bill."
